column4: I installed the package ubuntu-restricted-extras and java --version shows it installed but in firefox i get a white box for minecraft
what is the output of:  lsb_release -d
sudo add-apt-repository ppa:ferramroberto/java; sudo apt-get update; sudo apt-get install sun-java6-jre sun-java6-plugin sun-java6-fonts
close all browsers then rerun to load the plugin
if you move the pwd to the folder containing the jar file, does it work?
change the directory to where the file is stored
minecraft is a 3D game.You need 3D accelleration for it to run
what video chip do you use?
what is the output of:  lspsci | grep -i vga
ok, i use the same chip, what is the output of:  sudo lshw -C display; dpkg -l | grep nvidia
give it time, then pastebin the output
try:  sudo apt-get install nvidia-current      then reboot
